alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 9:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Arthur, northwestern Keith and Garden Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 857 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Keystone to Lemoyne to 8 miles southeast of Lisco. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oshkosh, Arthur, Lewellen, Lisco, Lemoyne, Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Dogtown Flats, Richardson Lake, Bucktail Lake, Bourquim Hill, Three Mile Lake, Adams Flats, Sugar Loaf Hill, Ruthon, Haythorn Lake, Rackett and Lena. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 99 and 131. Highway 92 between mile markers 115 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
